text: Uwe Friedrichsen (27 May 1934 - 30 April 2016) was a German movie and television actor. He was born in Hamburg, Germany. He was known for his roles in Faust, John Kling, Maximilian von Mexiko, Sesamstra√üe, and Schwarz Rot Gold. Friedrichsen died in Hamburg, Germany from complications of pneumonia on 30 April 2016, aged 81.Uwe Friedrichsen ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== * *Scherf Agency Berlin Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:Actors from Hamburg
